question: In November 2017,  in what phase  was  the clinical trial for the drug SYL040012?
ideal_answer: SYL040012 is in phase 2 clinical trials

snippets.text: This review addresses nine small-interfering RNAs (siRNAs) and one unique microRNA (miRNA) inhibitor, which entered the phase 2-3 clinical trials. The siRNAs in focus are PF-04523655, TKM-080301, Atu027, SYL040012, SYL1001, siG12D-LODER (phase 2), QPI-1002, QPI-1007, and patisiran (phase 3).
